components.description:
A plain soft hat with a rounded crown and a stiff bill. Most often shown in a shade of blue and displayed at an angle to clearly display its outwards- protruding bill.

Regularly associated with the slang term "capping", meaning "lying". Responding to a message with a single ðŸ§¢ emoji is viewable as an accusation of lying (“cap”) while stating "no ðŸ§¢" ("no cap") is intended to emphasize the truthfulness of a statement.

title: Billed Cap

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.
